game.title: Mystery Game
game.synopsis: The main protagonist wakes up one morning to find a letter from their deceased mother. The letter contains details about a mysterious game she was playing before her death and provides clues to solve the mystery. As they embark on a journey to unravel the mystery, they encounter strange creatures and face unexpected challenges. With each discovery, they inch closer to solving the puzzle and uncover a hidden legacy of their mother's secret life.
game.beginning: The protagonist finds a letter from their deceased mother...
game.ending: They uncover their mother's hidden legacy
